title: The Objects that Power the Global Economy
description: You may not have seen these objects before, but theyâ€™ve already changed the way you live.Each chapter of this book examines an object that is driving radical change in the global economy: how we communicate, what we eat, the way we spend our money. The stories are told through global reporting, original photography and illustration by award-winning artists, contributions from business visionaries, data visualization, and interactive features.
author: Quartz
